name: Eggsometric
description:
Globe is warming up! The penguin pair Anna & Anders among other pairs struggle keeping their eggs safe. Ice gets thinner and cracks suddenly anywhere. Help the penguins move their eggs to safer place.

Rules:
Collect all the eggs with you to keep them safe. If anyone drops to the water, the game is over. All the penguins move at the same time when you move them unless something is blocking their way. Be careful out there and keep an eye on all of them, they are not too many!

****
Researcher Shawn Farry has been counting the penguins in Palmer station for 43 years and the amount of penguins has decreased dramatically. You can read more in the news https://www.cbsnews.com/news/climate-diaries-antarctica-penguin-population-decli...
